text: I don’t suppose any one has every written a guide on moving from Jekyll to Franklin?

elements.text: I don’t suppose any one has every written a guide on moving from Jekyll to Franklin?

text:
no but in effect there’s not much different from moving from Jekyll to Franklin than moving from anything to Franklin basically the steps  are:

1. get the layout (there’s some rudimentary  docs on how to do  that <https://franklinjl.org/styling/templates/>
2. Jekyll’s md is  pretty close to  something that will just work for Franklin, the key thing to adapt is front-matter
Either way,  I’m very happy to  help, so if you get started with the layout and ping me from your repo, I’ll be glad to help (I migrated 3 websites over the weekend so I’m reasonably quick at  this)
